models.name: Oathbringer
models.usage: The blade made it almost effortless. It does that. Dalinar couldn't decide if it's a curse. He closed Adolin's eyes. He looked to the NORTH. He need to go close to that window.

models.name: Infused Sphere
models.usage:
Bright light shot from his hand.
"This should last"
When his eyes adjusted he saw a puddle in the middle of the hall.

models.name: Med-Kit
models.usage: It's empty... "I didn't check, I didn't check..". Couple of seconds passed. He closed Adolin's eyes. He looked to the NORTH. He need to go close to that window.
